t: Every publishing strategy should start with Amazon and Ingram - The Idea Logical Company
s: January 6, 2023 - Both Amazon and Ingram have branded programs to on-board small publishers and authors. Amazon’s is KDP (Kindle Direct Publishing) and Ingram’s is IngramSpark. There is a lot for any publisher or author to know to optimize their relationship with either company.
